title: [24/96] AC/DC - Highway To Hell (1979) - 2003, Vinyl Rip

Sony Music - 5107641, BIEM / GEMA, Europe, Remastered, Reissue

LP, Vinyl Rip, 24/96, FLAC (tracks+.cue)

Rip by aksman

 B4 - Love Hungry Man (4:17)
 B5 - Night Prowler (6:27)

No silence been removed, please burn gapless to match original tracklayout.
